scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第23集:材料采购·黄粱灵君。

scenes.description: 韩立一家家查看店铺中的灵具材料,转了七八家后,心中暗叹一口气。

visual.composition: Han Li checks artifact materials shop by shop, after seven or eight shops, sighs inwardly

scenes.prompt: Han Li checks artifact materials shop by shop, after seven or eight shops, sighs inwardly.
scenes.narration: 韩立一家家查看店铺中的灵具材料,转了七八家后,心中暗叹一口气。

scenes.description: 这些店铺的材料不能说不好,有些绝对称得上精品,但对韩立现在的境界来说用处不大。

visual.composition: Shop materials not bad, some truly fine, but useless to Han Li at his current level

scenes.prompt: Shop materials not bad, some truly fine, but useless to Han Li at his current level.
scenes.narration: 这些店铺的材料不能说不好，有些绝对称得上精品，但对韩立用处不大。

scenes.description: 田兴察言观色,看出韩立看不上这里的东西,提议去另一个地方看看。

visual.composition: Tian Xing reads Han Li's expression, sees he doesn't like items here, suggests another place
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing suggesting, Han Li listening

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing reads Han Li's expression, sees he doesn't like items here, suggests another place.
scenes.narration: 田兴察言观色,看出韩立看不上这里的东西,提议去另一个地方看看。

scenes.description: 韩立和田兴离开街道,在城中拦了一辆兽车准备上车。

visual.composition: Han Li and Tian Xing leave street, flag down a beast cart in city
visual.character_pose: Han Li and Tian Xing boarding cart

scenes.prompt: Han Li and Tian Xing leave street, flag down a beast cart in city.
scenes.narration: 韩立和田兴离开街道,在城中拦了一辆兽车准备上车。

scenes.description: 韩立刚将一只脚踏上兽车,忽然一声龙吟从高空传来,接着仿佛虎啸般的吼声滚滚而来。

visual.composition: Han Li just steps on cart when dragon roar from sky, followed by tiger-like roar rolling across

scenes.prompt: Han Li just steps on cart when dragon roar from sky, followed by tiger-like roar rolling across.
scenes.narration: 韩立刚将一只脚踏上兽车，忽然一声龙吟从高空传来，虎啸般的吼声滚滚而来。

scenes.description: 两种声音交织顿挫,传遍附近整个天空,引得下方凡人和修士一阵骚动。

visual.composition: Two sounds interweave and echo, spreading across nearby sky, causing commotion among mortals and cultivators below

scenes.prompt: Two sounds interweave and echo, spreading across nearby sky, causing commotion among mortals and cultivators below.
scenes.narration: 两种声音交织顿挫,传遍附近整个天空,引得下方凡人和修士一阵骚动。

scenes.description: 韩立朝声音传来的天边望去,只见一个黑点以极快速度激射而来。

visual.composition: Han Li looks toward sky where sound comes from, sees a black dot shooting over at incredible speed

scenes.prompt: Han Li looks toward sky where sound comes from, sees a black dot shooting over at incredible speed.
scenes.narration: 韩立朝声音传来的天边望去,只见一个黑点以极快速度激射而来。

scenes.description: 转眼间就到了韩立等人上空,竟是三头生有虎头龙首两颗头颅的怪兽,拉着的一辆淡青色飞车。

visual.composition: In moments reaches Han Li's group overhead, three beasts with tiger and dragon heads pulling pale green flying cart

scenes.prompt: In moments reaches Han Li's group overhead, three beasts with tiger and dragon heads pulling pale green flying cart.
scenes.narration: 转眼间就到了韩立等人上空，竟是三头生有虎头龙首的怪兽，拉着淡青色飞车。

scenes.description: 飞车从高空飞快掠过,龙吟虎啸之声转眼间远去,田兴失声叫道:'黄粱灵君竟离开了洞府!'

visual.composition: Flying cart quickly passes overhead, dragon and tiger roars fade, Tian Xing exclaims: 'Huangliang Spirit Lord left his cave!'

scenes.prompt: Flying cart quickly passes overhead, dragon and tiger roars fade, Tian Xing exclaims: 'Huangliang Spirit Lord left his cave!'
scenes.narration: 飞车从高空飞快掠过,龙吟虎啸之声转眼间远去,田兴失声叫道:'黄粱灵君竟离开了洞府!'

scenes.description: 韩立询问黄粱灵君是何人,田兴称他是落日城第一修士,在附近山中居住了万年之久。

visual.composition: Han Li asks who Huangliang Spirit Lord is, Tian Xing says he's Sunset City's top cultivator, lived in nearby mountain for ten thousand years
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing explaining, Han Li listening

scenes.prompt: Han Li asks who Huangliang Spirit Lord is, Tian Xing says he's Sunset City's top cultivator, lived in nearby mountain for ten thousand years.
scenes.narration: 韩立询问黄粱灵君是何人,田兴称他是落日城第一修士,在附近山中居住了万年之久。

scenes.description: 田兴称黄粱灵君已经过了五行合一的关口,是一名炼虚初期修士。

visual.composition: Tian Xing says Huangliang Spirit Lord passed Five Elements Unity, is an early-stage Spirit Transformation cultivator
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing excited, Han Li serious

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing says Huangliang Spirit Lord passed Five Elements Unity, is an early-stage Spirit Transformation cultivator.
scenes.narration: 田兴称黄粱灵君已经过了五行合一的关口,是一名炼虚初期修士。

scenes.description: 韩立心中一惊,炼虚初期修士在灵界已经是极高的境界,三皇等人也不过是合体境界。

visual.composition: Han Li's heart startles, early Spirit Transformation is extremely high in Spirit Realm, Three Emperors only at Unity stage

scenes.prompt: Han Li's heart startles, early Spirit Transformation is extremely high in Spirit Realm, Three Emperors only at Unity stage.
scenes.narration: 韩立心中一惊,炼虚初期修士在灵界已经是极高的境界,三皇等人也不过是合体境界。

scenes.description: 韩立和田兴上了兽车,田兴继续介绍黄粱灵君的事迹,韩立只是微微一笑。

visual.composition: Han Li and Tian Xing board cart, Tian Xing continues explaining Huangliang Spirit Lord's deeds, Han Li smiles slightly
visual.character_pose: Both in cart, Tian Xing talking

scenes.prompt: Han Li and Tian Xing board cart, Tian Xing continues explaining Huangliang Spirit Lord's deeds, Han Li smiles slightly.
scenes.narration: 韩立和田兴上了兽车,田兴继续介绍黄粱灵君的事迹,韩立只是微微一笑。

scenes.description: 兽车在城中狂奔数个时辰后,上了一条陌生街道,在街头尽头处蓦然停下。

visual.composition: Beast cart races through city for hours, reaches unfamiliar street, suddenly stops at end

scenes.prompt: Beast cart races through city for hours, reaches unfamiliar street, suddenly stops at end.
scenes.narration: 兽车在城中狂奔数个时辰后,上了一条陌生街道,在街头尽头处蓦然停下。

scenes.description: 韩立从车上跳下,目光一扫,就看到一个看似不小的店铺,大门高大,用金粉装饰,挂着'穹宇阁'招牌。

visual.composition: Han Li jumps from cart, scans area, sees a sizable shop, tall golden-decorated door, 'Qiongyu Pavilion' sign

scenes.prompt: Han Li jumps from cart, scans area, sees a sizable shop, tall golden-decorated door, 'Qiongyu Pavilion' sign.
scenes.narration: 韩立从车上跳下,目光一扫,就看到一个看似不小的店铺,大门高大,用金粉装饰,挂着'穹宇阁'招牌。

scenes.description: 大门前两侧有两根丈许长的青色铁柱,上面用银色细链各拴着一头赤红色、仿佛蜥蜴模样的怪兽。

visual.composition: Two zhang-tall cyan iron pillars before door, silver chains binding red lizard-like beasts on each

scenes.prompt: Two zhang-tall cyan iron pillars before door, silver chains binding red lizard-like beasts on each.
scenes.narration: 大门前两侧有两根丈许长的青色铁柱,上面用银色细链各拴着一头赤红色、仿佛蜥蜴模样的怪兽。

scenes.description: 两只怪兽在韩立走下马车的一瞬间,马上站起身子,用小眼死死盯着韩立,露出不善的目光。

visual.composition: Two beasts stand immediately as Han Li steps from cart, small eyes fixed on Han Li, showing hostile intent

scenes.prompt: Two beasts stand immediately as Han Li steps from cart, small eyes fixed on Han Li, showing hostile intent.
scenes.narration: 两只怪兽在韩立走下马车的一瞬间,马上站起身子,用小眼死死盯着韩立,露出不善的目光。

scenes.description: 田兴紧跟在韩立后面,见怪兽凑过来却毫不在意,手中掏出一个淡黄色牌子冲两只怪兽一摇。

visual.composition: Tian Xing follows behind Han Li, sees beasts approaching but unconcerned, takes out pale yellow token, waves at beasts
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing showing token, beasts calming

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing follows behind Han Li, sees beasts approaching but unconcerned, takes out pale yellow token, waves at beasts.
scenes.narration: 田兴紧跟在韩立后面,见怪兽凑过来却毫不在意,手中掏出一个淡黄色牌子冲两只怪兽一摇。

scenes.description: 两只怪兽发出几声低吼,懒洋洋地再次趴伏在地上不动,二人从怪兽中间走过。

visual.composition: Two beasts growl softly, lazily lie down again, two men pass between them
visual.character_pose: Han Li and Tian Xing walking past beasts

scenes.prompt: Two beasts growl softly, lazily lie down again, two men pass between them.
scenes.narration: 两只怪兽发出几声低吼,懒洋洋地再次趴伏在地上不动,二人从怪兽中间走过。

scenes.description: 到了里面,韩立眉头不经意一皱,只是一个六七丈大小的简单屋子,四周货架空空如也。

visual.composition: Inside, Han Li frowns slightly, just a simple six-to-seven zhang room, empty shelves around

scenes.prompt: Inside, Han Li frowns slightly, just a simple six-to-seven zhang room, empty shelves around.
scenes.narration: 到了里面,韩立眉头不经意一皱,只是一个六七丈大小的简单屋子,四周货架空空如也。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第24集即将开始。
